mapper.select: select cbt_no, ques, lang_cd, cnsr, ex1, ex2, ex3, ex4, attach, attach_dir, cnsr_cnt, call, explna, utp_cd, lang_cd, member_id from cbt_user where lang_cd = #{langCd}
mapper.insert:
SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(cbt_no) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(cbt_no)+1 END ID FROM cbt_user
insert into cbt_user values(#{cbtNo},#{ques},#{cnsr},#{ex1},#{ex2},#{ex3},#{ex4}, #{attach},#{attachDir},0,0,#{explna},#{utpCd},#{langCd},#{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT U.cbt_no,U.ques,U.lang_cd, U.cnsr, U.ex1, U.ex2, U.ex3, U.ex4, U.attach, U.attach_dir, U.cnsr_cnt, U.call, U.explna, U.utp_cd, U.member_id ,C.cd_name FROM (SELECT ROWNUM, cbt_no, ques, lang_cd, cnsr, ex1, ex2, ex3, ex4, attach, attach_dir, cnsr_cnt, call, explna, utp_cd, member_id FROM cbt_user where lang_cd=#{langCd}) U,cmmncd C WHERE C.cd_ini = 'L' and C.cd_no = U.lang_cd and rownum = #{rownum}

SELECT U.cbt_no,U.ques,U.lang_cd, U.cnsr, U.ex1, U.ex2, U.ex3, U.ex4, U.attach, U.attach_dir, U.cnsr_cnt, U.call, U.explna, U.utp_cd, U.member_id ,C.cd_name FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rowno, cbt_no, ques, lang_cd, cnsr, ex1, ex2, ex3, ex4, attach, attach_dir, cnsr_cnt, call, explna, utp_cd, member_id FROM cbt_user where lang_cd=#{langCd}) U,cmmncd C WHERE C.cd_ini = 'L' and C.cd_no = U.lang_cd and U.rowno = #{rownum}

SELECT CBT_NO, CASE WHEN LENGTH(QUES) > 30 THEN SUBSTR(QUES,0,30)||'..' ELSE SUBSTR(QUES,0,30) END AS QUES, CNSR , CNSR_CNT, CALL, UTP_CD, LANG_CD FROM CBT_USER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY CBT_NO
